song_name: In Dreams I Dance With You
metrics_conclusion: In Dreams I Dance With You has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty.
key_conclusion: In Dreams I Dance With You has sections analyzed in the following keys: A♭ Major, E♭ Major,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
